articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT swaresh binaykiya
Power of Decentralized Storage
Imagine you're an avid photographer, capturing precious moments of life. You store these memories in a cloud service. 
One day, the unexpected happens – a server glitch wipes out your entire gallery. Heart-wrenching, right?

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🚨🚨🚨 PLEASE BE EXTREMELY CAREFUL
Major exploit reported in Ledger's connectkit library...
General recommendation out there is don't interact with any dApps until the exploit is better understood.

banteg: 🚨 ledger library confirmed compromised and replaced with a drainer. wait out interacting with any dapps till things become clearer.
https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1

articles.description:
RT nader dabit | nader.lens
Build a live streaming app in <2 minutes ⚡️

Livepeer: Introducing the Livepeer Studio CLI 🔑 ⚡️
As part of a massive upgrade to Livepeer docs and developer experience, we're releasing a new command line tool that lets developers get a @livepeerstudio API key and launch an ultra low latency video app in seconds💨 🚀
articles.title: RT nader dabit | nader.lens: Build a live streaming app in <2 minutes ⚡️

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Ever heard about layers and asked yourself what it means? 😵
@Jamiescript will tell you! 🚀

Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 12
Write about blockchain scalability solutions.
Blockchain scaling solutions are a race against congestion. As blockchain technology gains traction, its scalability has emerged as a major challenge.
articles.title: Ever heard about layers and asked yourself what it means? 😵 @Jamiescript will tell you! 🚀

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Sharding, rollups, and more explained by @iaminiekanem 🤓

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔶🔸Blockchain Scalability Solutions🔸🔶
Blockchain scalability is the ability of a blockchain to handle an increasing number of transactions without compromising performance and efficiency
It is a multifaceted challenge that's being solved as blockchains gain more adoption
🧵
articles.title: Sharding, rollups, and more explained by @iaminiekanem 🤓
